Party.description: Represents an actor, either an individual (Person) or a group (Organization). This is an abstract concept serving as a parent for more specific actor types.

Person.description: Represents a legal entity or a formal group of people with a particular purpose, such as a company, institution, or association. In the CRM context, it is typically the entity managing customer relationships or a business customer itself. Based on the O-CREAM concept of an enterprise or actor involved in business activities.

Organization.description: Represents a legal entity or a formal group of people with a particular purpose, such as a company, institution, or association. In the CRM context, it is typically the entity managing customer relationships or a business customer itself. Based on the O-CREAM concept of an enterprise or actor involved in business activities.

name.description: The display name of the organization.

legalName.description: The official legal name of the organization.

industry.description: The industry sector the organization operates in.

size.description: The size category of the organization (e.g., 'Small', 'Medium', 'Large').

foundedYear.description: The year the organization was founded.

headquarters.description: The headquarters location of the organization.

address.description: The primary address of the organization.

phone.description: The primary phone number of the organization.

email.description: The primary email address of the organization.

parentOrganizationId.description: The ID of the parent organization if this is a subsidiary.

activities.description: Array of activity IDs associated with this organization.

knowledgeElements.description: Array of knowledge element IDs associated with this organization.

validationStatus.description: The validation status of the organization (valid, invalid, unchecked).

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the organization.

updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the organization.

ContactPoint.description: A means of contacting an entity, like an email address or phone number.

Email.description: A unique electronic address for sending and receiving messages.

PhoneNumber.description: A sequence of digits assigned to a telephone endpoint for routing calls.

Activity.description: An abstract concept representing a process or a set of actions performed by one or more actors, such as a communication or a task.

Contact.description: A person of interest in a professional context, such as a business lead, a partner, or a team member.

name.description: The full name of the contact.

email.description: The primary email address of the contact.

title.description: The job title or role of the contact (e.g., 'CEO', 'Investment Analyst').

firstName.description: The first name of the contact.

lastName.description: The last name of the contact.

phone.description: The phone number of the contact.

organizationId.description: The ID of the organization this contact belongs to.

activities.description: Array of activity IDs associated with this contact.

knowledgeElements.description: Array of knowledge element IDs associated with this contact.

validationStatus.description: The validation status of the contact (valid, invalid, unchecked).

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the contact.

updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the contact.

additionalEmails.description: Array of additional email addresses for the contact.

address.description: The address information for the contact.

WORKS_FOR.description: Indicates that a person is employed by or works for an organization.

HAS_EMAIL.description: Links a person to their email.

HAS_PHONE.description: Links a person to their phone number.

PART_OF.description: An entity mentioned in or part of a communication.

HAS_ADDRESS.description: Links an entity to its address location.

HAS_PARENT_ORGANIZATION.description: Indicates that an organization is a subsidiary or division of another.
